Field Label:
Research Group primary name
(e.g. CCASAnet, NA-ACCORD)

Research Group full name
Write out long name, no abbreviations (e.g. Caribbean, Central and South America network for HIV Epidemiology, North American AIDS Cohort Collaboration on Research and Design)

Research Group short code
A short code for each research group is needed for Hub display purposes. (e.g. CN, NA)

Is this an Active Research Group in the Consortium?
(ex. use this to indicate current research groups vs. those that have left or been dropped from the Consortium.)

Should this Research Group be listed in the main interface?
(ex. this can be used to exclude groups such as a Testing group from the Consortium Metrics.)

Will this Research Group participate in voting?
Only these Research Groups will appear on the voting dashboard. Active groups that do not participate in voting could include an NIH group, or a Hub Testing group.

Section Header:
Display Settings for Research Group Map
(Map data is stored separately in the Site Census project)
Field Label: What map should display for users from this Research Group?
Choices, Calculations, OR Slider Labels: 0, This Research Group's geographic area (defined below) | 1, World Map
